Amptek Silicon Drift Diode (SDD)
Efficiency versus energy for 3 window thickness
For each configuration, the first column is total attenuation, second is photoabsorption
Data computed using NIST attenutation values (physics.nist.gov) and nominal device specifications

For more information, visit www.amptek.com
